thread.title: What Yo-Yo Ma is learning about life and music at 60 PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: What Yo-Yo Ma is learning about life and music at 60 | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: What Yo-Yo Ma is learning about life and music at 60 PBS NewsHour
text: Yo-Yo Ma has been on stage from an early age, turning out some 90 albums and performing for eight presidents. At 60, the classical music star is taking a step back to reflect on life. On his new album, "Songs from the Arc of Life," he and a longtime collaborator use the music of cherished composers to create a soundtrack of change, love and loss. Jeffrey Brown reports.
